results.title: Drug Eruption From Atorvastatin: With Initial Misdiagnosis of Tinea Cruris.
results.text_hl: Background Prior to switching to @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ had been taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for 21 years without @<m>DISEASE_Exanthema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rash@@@.

citations.NLM: Hanson K, Mattes RG, Cauthon KAB. Drug Eruption From Atorvastatin: With Initial Misdiagnosis of Tinea Cruris. Sr Care Pharm. 2023 Feb 1;38(2):63-69. PMID: 36751936

results.title: Simvastatin-induced Changes in the Leukocytic System of Porcine Bone Marrow
results.text_hl: Unfortunately, it shows numerous side effects. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ affects various internal organs, and among other detriments to health may cause persistent @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@, @DISEASE_Pathologic_Processes @DISEASE_MESH:D010335 @@@osteolytic processes@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headaches@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Exanthema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rashes@@@.

citations.NLM: Snarska A, Wysocka D, Rytel L, Gonkowski S, Pawelec H, Sobiech P. Simvastatin-induced Changes in the Leukocytic System of Porcine Bone Marrow J Vet Res. 2018 Sep;62(3):329-333. PMID: 30584612
citations.BibTeX: @article{30584612, title={Simvastatin-induced Changes in the Leukocytic System of Porcine Bone Marrow}, author={Snarska A and Wysocka D and Rytel L and Gonkowski S and Pawelec H and Sobiech P}, journal={J Vet Res}, volume={62}, number={3}, pages={329-333}}

results.title: Lipid-altering efficacy and safety of ezetimibe/simvastatin versus atorvastatin in patients with hypercholesterolemia and the metabolic syndrome (from the VYMET study).
results.text_hl: The incidence of @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver, muscle, and gastrointestinal@@@-, @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@- and @DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergic reaction@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Exanthema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rash@@@-related adverse events were low and generally similar to those in previous studies of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and/or @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Robinson JG, Ballantyne CM, Grundy SM, Hsueh WA, Parving HH, Rosen JB, Adewale AJ, Polis AB, Tomassini JE, Tershakovec AM. Lipid-altering efficacy and safety of ezetimibe/simvastatin versus atorvastatin in patients with hypercholesterolemia and the metabolic syndrome (from the VYMET study). Am J Cardiol. 2009 Jun 15;103(12):1694-702. PMID: 19539078

results.title: Dermatomyositis-like syndrome and HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor (statin) intake.
results.text_hl: A @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ developed an adult-onset @DISEASE_Dermatomyositis @DISEASE_MESH:D003882 @@@dermatomyositis-like syndrome@@@ characterized by @<m>DISEASE_Exanthema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@skin rash@@@ and progressive @DISEASE_Spinal_Muscular_Atrophies_of_Childhood @DISEASE_MESH:D014897 @@@proximal@@@ @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ concurrent with the intake of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Vasconcelos OM, Campbell WW. Dermatomyositis-like syndrome and HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor (statin) intake. Muscle Nerve. 2004 Dec;30(6):803-7. PMID: 15389654
